title: No database
description: simplitt stores all your content in a single flat file.

title: Static site
description: simplitt generates a complete static site from your single data file: home page, category pagesand post pages.

title: No installation
description: simplitt needs no installation. Just set up some parameters and upload the files to your server.

title: Easy update
description: simplitt makes all the work: just run a script and simplitt will recompile and update your entire site.
